testcase.name: Cwcontroller Weather Report Operator Initially Should create CR Successfully
Cwcontroller Weather Report Operator Initially Should created CR exist
Cwcontroller Weather Report Operator Initially When CR is Exists Should create Pod(s)
Cwcontroller Weather Report Operator Initially Once Pod exists Should update CR status
Cwcontroller Weather Report Operator Initially Update CR to remove london and add chicago and austin Should update new cr
Cwcontroller Weather Report Operator Initially Update CR to remove london and add chicago and austin Should have new city in the spec
Cwcontroller Weather Report Operator Initially Once CR is updated should delete london pod
Cwcontroller Weather Report Operator Initially Once CR is updated should create new austin pod
Cwcontroller Weather Report Operator Initially Once CR is updated Should update CR status with new pods
